description: When attempting to create a bytearray of size greater than the maximum size supported by the Python interpreter, an OverflowError is raised. The error is caused by the Python interpreter not being able to allocate the requested memory for the bytearray.
output:
bytearray(b'\n\x14\x1e(2<')
